Name: A Pinch of Magic
About the game: Varsha is a young witch who has just graduated high school. While their friends were off jet setting and travelling around the world, Varsha had to go back to their hometown Lynnsdale to take care of their grandparents who ran a small magic store. There were two major issues though: one, magic is strictly banned and two, their grandparents store is on the verge of bankruptcy. Play as Varsha as you try to revive your grandparent's store, avoid scrutiny by the authorities, and find loveâ€”all in one summer. Features Pick from 2 main character designs to play as as well as your pronouns Spend time with 2 love interests, 3 endings Over 25,000 words- for free! An art gallery for CGs and guest artwork
